attributes.action: lobby the oc of usmc forces hawai to remove marine motais for bringing the coalition forces into disrepute by his actions in iraq.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Marine motaris has been filmed while serving in iraq throwing a 8/9 week old puppy over a bridge  with drop of over 40 feet,while his section just laughed  this man is representing the whole of the western world in a hearts and minds conflict, he is suposed to be showing the west is a caring area of the world,with high values on all forms of life, while men like him serve in areas like this with the backing of most of the west how can we ever hope to bring a peacfull end to this never ending conflict, please sign up to have this man removed from the us forces.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
